alert.note: Alert for Baker; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 8:41PM EST until December 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Georgia... St Mary`s River At Macclenny affecting Charlton, Baker and Nassau Counties. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 700 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Mary`s River at Macclenny. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas and timber lands including some properties along St. Mary`s River Bluff Road and the Cypress Landing Resort on the Georgia side. At 14.0 feet, Flooding of bottomlands along the river and some lower access roads including the lower half of St. Mary`s River Bluff Road which cuts off 15 to 20 homes on the Georgia side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 11.0 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
